GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.30 to before v5.4.198
GSD.description:
crypto: cryptd - Protect per-CPU resource by disabling BH.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit 6d7b2cf5c7ed875f78c5a095bd1b5255ea53eec6, it was introduced in version v2.6.30 by commit 254eff771441f4ee7aa9cf770a6e4820492c9dab. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: crypto: cryptd - Protect per-CPU resource by disabling BH.
